1:
Yahweh, do not rebuke me in your anger;\q do not punish me in your wrath.
\q
2:
For your arrows pierce me,\q and your hand presses me down.


\q
3:
My whole body is sick because of your anger;\q there is no health in my bones because of my sin.
\q
4:
For my iniquities overwhelm me;\q they are a burden too heavy for me.


\q
5:
My wounds are infected and smell\q because of my foolish sins.
\q
6:
I am stooped over and humiliated every day;\q I go about mourning all day long.


\q
7:
For within me, I am filled with burning;\q there is no health in my flesh.
\q
8:
I am numb and utterly crushed;\q I groan because of the anguish of my heart.


\q
9:
Lord, you understand my heart's deepest yearnings,\q and my groanings are not hidden from you.
\q
10:
My heart pounds, my strength fades,\q and my eyesight dims.


\q
11:
My friends and companions shun me because of my condition;\q my neighbors stand far off.
\q
12:
Those who seek my life lay snares for me.\q They who seek my harm speak destructive words
\q and say deceitful words all day long.


\q
13:
But I, I am like a deaf man and hear nothing;\q I am like a mute man who says nothing.
\q
14:
I am like a man who does not hear\q and who has no reply.


\q
15:
Surely I wait for you, Yahweh;\q you will answer, Lord my God.
\q
16:
I say this so that my enemies will not gloat over me.\q If my foot slips, they will do terrible things to me.


\q
17:
For I am about to stumble,\q and I am in constant pain.
\q
18:
I confess my guilt;\q I am concerned about my sin.


\q
19:
But my enemies are numerous;\q those who hate me wrongfully are many.
\q
20:
They repay me evil for good;\q they hurl accusations at me although I have pursued what is good.


\q
21:
Do not abandon me, Yahweh;\q my God, do not stay far away from me.
\q
22: Come quickly to help me,\q Lord, my salvation.
